winsorize(top50,4) then ts_zscore over 10 days to reduce outliers and capture momentum. SUGGESTION1 single field used; SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 not needed; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs kept short. Confidence 0.68.

results.idea: Topranking conditional trade when domain breadth low
results.description: If totaldomains < threshold then act on top ranking signal (concentrated interest). SUGGESTION1 two fields used; SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 not needed; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: 2 fields, conditional operator. Confidence 0.59.

results.idea: Skewness-driven continuation (positive skew and rising topranking)
results.description: If sign(skewness)>0 and ts_delta(topranking,5)>0 then favor. SUGGESTION1 two fields applied; SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 not required; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs short. Confidence 0.71.

results.idea: Topranking normalized by recent max (to detect breakout)
results.description: divide(topranking, ts_max_diff(topranking,30)+1) to find current near-max leaders. SUGGESTION1 single field used; SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 not required; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs: 1 field, 2 operators. Confidence 0.67.

results.idea: Top50 avg momentum vs long-run variability
results.description: divide(subtract(ts_mean(top50,5), ts_mean(top50,30)), ts_std_dev(top50,60)) to scale recent momentum by long-term volatility. SUGGESTION1 single field; SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 not needed; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs within limits. Confidence 0.72.

ts_zscore(winsorize(dltcc,4), 20) to capture sustained country-TLD momentum while controlling outliers. SUGGESTION1 single field used; SUGGESTION2 N/A; SUGGESTION3 not needed; SUGGESTION4 applied. KEEP_IN_MINDs concise. Confidence 0.55.
